reviewText: Many of those who edit video still wish Liquid was on the market.  This teaching tool is excellent for the beginner and is a step by step instruction into an obsolete video editing program which I and many feel is better than Adobe Premier or Avid.  It is much more sophisticated than Pinnacle Studio 15 and getting long in the tooth for it has not received any support for many years.

I am pretty new to avid liquid so I have to say that these dvd's have been very helpful for me. I have learned a great deal already about things that I did not know about. If you want to learn more and get more out of your software I recommend this set of dvd's.
